movies.title: Iron Man
movies.description: Tony Stark builds a high-tech suit of armor to fight injustice after escaping captivity.

movies.title: The Incredible Hulk
movies.description: Bruce Banner becomes the Hulk as he searches for a cure while on the run from the military.

movies.title: Iron Man 2
movies.description: Tony Stark faces new enemies and government pressure as he continues his superhero journey.

movies.title: Thor
movies.description: Thor, the god of thunder, is banished to Earth and must prove himself worthy.

movies.title: Captain America: The First Avenger
movies.description: Steve Rogers becomes Captain America to fight in WWII and face the Red Skull.

movies.title: The Avengers
movies.description: Earth's mightiest heroes team up to stop Loki and an alien invasion.

movies.title: Iron Man 3
movies.description: Tony Stark faces PTSD and a mysterious terrorist known as the Mandarin.

movies.title: Thor: The Dark World
movies.description: Thor must stop Malekith from plunging the universe into darkness.

movies.title: Captain America: The Winter Soldier
movies.description: Captain America uncovers a conspiracy and faces a ghost from his past.

movies.title: Guardians of the Galaxy
movies.description: A group of misfits team up to protect a powerful orb from falling into the wrong hands.
